# MEDAS Solutions - Healthcare Software Provider
> Enterprise healthcare software solutions for hospitals, clinics, and laboratories in the GCC region and worldwide.

MEDAS Solutions is a leading healthcare technology company providing Hospital Information Systems (HIS), Electronic Medical Records (EMR), Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS), and telemedicine solutions. Founded in 2004, we serve 500+ healthcare facilities across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain, and 20+ countries worldwide.

## Company Overview
- Founded: 2004
- Headquarters: Dubai, UAE
- Employees: 200+
- Clients: 500+ healthcare facilities
- Coverage: 4 continents, 20+ countries

## Products

### E-Clinic
Comprehensive outpatient clinic management software for polyclinics and medical centers.
- Multi-specialty support
- Appointment scheduling and queue management
- Clinical documentation and e-prescribing
- Insurance claim processing
- Patient portal and mobile app

### HIMS (Hospital Information Management System)
Complete web-based hospital ERP with 32+ integrated modules.
- Patient registration and scheduling
- Inpatient and outpatient management
- Emergency department and operation theatre
- Pharmacy, laboratory, and radiology
- Billing, insurance, and inventory management

### E-Lab (Laboratory Information System)
Advanced laboratory workflow automation.
- Sample tracking with barcode identification
- 3000+ analyzer interfaces
- Auto-validation and quality control
- HL7/ASTM connectivity
- Critical value alerts

### Telemedicine Platform
Virtual care solution for remote consultations.
- HD video consultations
- E-prescribing and file sharing
- Online appointment booking and payments
- Multi-participant calls

### E-Pharma (Pharmacy Management)
Complete pharmacy operations management.
- Inventory and procurement management
- Drug interaction checking
- Controlled substance management
- Multi-branch support

### E-Veterinary
Specialized software for veterinary clinics.
- Pet registration and medical records
- Vaccination tracking
- Appointment scheduling and billing

### Mobile Application
Patient engagement platform for iOS and Android.
- Appointment booking and medical history access
- Lab results and prescription viewing
- Video consultations and bill payments

### AccreHealth
JCI accreditation and quality management software.
- Document and policy management
- Audit scheduling and CAPA tracking
- Performance indicators

## Solutions

### Hospital Information System (HIS)
End-to-end hospital management covering all clinical, administrative, and financial workflows.

### Electronic Medical Records (EMR)
Comprehensive clinical documentation with decision support, e-prescribing, and patient portal.

### Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
Complete lab automation with analyzer integration, quality control, and regulatory compliance.

## Compliance & Integrations
- NABIDH (Dubai Health Authority)
- Malaffi (Abu Dhabi Health Information Exchange)
- NPHIES (Saudi National Health Information Exchange)
- Riayati (Saudi Electronic Health Records)
- HIPAA, GDPR compliance
- HL7, FHIR, DICOM, ICD-10, SNOMED standards

## Service Regions
- UAE: Dubai (Headquarters), Abu Dhabi
- Saudi Arabia: Al Khobar, Riyadh
- Qatar: Doha
- Kuwait: Kuwait City
- Bahrain: Manama
- India: Kochi (Development Center)
- Africa, Europe, Americas
